subject: College Athletics
Scholarships and Fellowships
lead_paragraph: The University of New England, in Biddeford, Me., is being investigated by the N.C.A.A. for possible financial-aid violations that could result in sanctions against its hockey program.
snippet: The University of New England, in Biddeford, Me., is being investigated by the N.C.A.A. for possible financial-aid violations that could result in sanctions against its hockey program.
